name: R4B-SupplyRequest-R5-SupplyRequest
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B SupplyRequest into FHIR R5

element.display: Request for a medication, substance or device

target.display: Request for a medication, substance or device
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest`
R4B `SupplyRequest.authoredOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.authoredOn`

element.display: The kind of supply (central, non-stock, etc.)

target.display: The kind of supply (central, non-stock, etc.)
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.category`
R4B `SupplyRequest.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.contained`
R4B `SupplyRequest.deliverFrom` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.deliverFrom`

R4B `SupplyRequest.deliverTo` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `SupplyRequest.deliverTo` - deliverTo has change due to type change: R4B `deliverTo` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `deliverTo`
R4B `SupplyRequest.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SupplyRequest.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `SupplyRequest.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.id`
R4B `SupplyRequest.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.implicitRules`

element.display: Medication, Substance, or Device requested to be supplied

target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SupplyRequest.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `SupplyRequest.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.meta`

R4B `SupplyRequest.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SupplyRequest.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: When the request should be fulfilled

target.display: When the request should be fulfilled
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.occurrence[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.occurrence[x]`
R4B `SupplyRequest.parameter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.parameter`
R4B `SupplyRequest.parameter.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.parameter.code`

R4B `SupplyRequest.parameter.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SupplyRequest.parameter.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `SupplyRequest.parameter.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.parameter.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.parameter.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SupplyRequest.parameter.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `SupplyRequest.parameter.value[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.parameter.value[x]`

R4B `SupplyRequest.priority` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.priority` - priority has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: The requested amount of the item indicated

target.display: The requested amount of the item indicated
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.quantity`

element.display: The reason why the supply item was requested
The reason why the supply item was requested

target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.requester` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `SupplyRequest.requester` - requester has change due to type change: R4B `requester` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `requester`

R4B `SupplyRequest.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/supplyrequest-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/supplyrequest-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Who is intended to fulfill the request

target.display: Who is intended to fulfill the request
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.supplier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.supplier`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `SupplyRequest.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SupplyRequest.text`
